subject: RE: [junit] Separate Assertion Object
msgSnippet: Why not just extend TestCase with specialized, re-usable, TestCase types? I ve done this on two big projects where it s been helpful to have a base TestCase
messageBody:
Why not just extend TestCase with specialized, re-usable, TestCase types?

I've done this on two big projects where it's been helpful to have a base
TestCase that everyone can extend if they want, which can provide custom
assertions, global variables (like a logger instance) and utility methods.

Scott Stirling
